pr_title: LUCENE-9618: Do not call IntervalIterator.nextInterval after NO_MORE_DOCS returned

timeline.message:
LUCENE-9618: Do not call IntervalIterator.nextInterval after
NO_MORE_DOCS is returned

timeline.bodyText: Hmm maybe be more specific than other methods?  E.g. maybe say returned by the query scorer's nextDoc() method?
timeline.author: mikemccand

timeline.bodyText: This is a new sentence -- maybe add . at end of previous one and capitlize If?
timeline.author: mikemccand

timeline.bodyText: Period at end of this sentence?
timeline.author: mikemccand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -82,6 +82,11 @@ public int width() {
   /**
    * Advance the iterator to the next interval
    *
+   * Should not be called after {@link DocIdSetIterator#NO_MORE_DOCS} is returned by other methods
+   * if that's the case in some existing code, please consider opening an issue
+   * However, after {@link IntervalIterator#NO_MORE_INTERVALS} is returned by this method, it might be
+   * called again

timeline.bodyText: You can add your name to the end of this CHANGES entry (in parens)?
timeline.author: mikemccand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -84,6 +84,8 @@ API Changes
 
 Improvements
 
+* LUCENE-9618: Do not call IntervalIterator.nextInterval after NO_MORE_DOCS is returned
